resources.string: Permission Denied!\n\nPlease enable storage permission by opening your Android Settings app and selecting Apps—>TEdit—>Permissions.
TEdit was not able to open the file.
Unfortunately your device ran out of memory whilst attempting to perform this operation.
TEdit might not be able to read this file, are you sure you\'d like to open it?
The database could not be opened.
Unable to access information in the database.
External storage media is not mounted.
The desired folder is protected, TEdit will not be able to write to this file.
The specified path does not exist.
An error occurred attempting to parse the file path.
TEdit was not able to create the new directory. You may not have permission to modify the contents of the current directory.
The contents of the document could not be retrieved.
The filename could not be retrieved.
Unable to save file. The Android distribution renamed the file to an unknown existing filename.
Android was not able to save the file under the requested name. The file was renamed to:
If you wish to browse your SDCard you must grant TEdit permission to do so by selecting the root folder of your SDCard in the following file manager.
Select a volume to browse. Root, internal or, if present, SDcard.
View the list of currently open documents.
Use your device\'s back button to close the browser. If you have one or more open documents this will switch to the last open document otherwise, this will quit the TEdit application.
Save a copy of the current document.
Search and replace text within the text document.
Switch to the second button layer.
Switch to the first button layer.
Use your device\'s back button to close the current document. If more than one document is open this will switch to one of the other open documents otherwise, this will switch to the file browser.
Swipe any item left or right to close the respective text file.
Use your device\'s back button to close the tabs view. If more than one document is open this will switch to the last open document otherwise, this will switch to the file browser.
Replace the currently selected instance of the search phrase with the replace phrase.
Replace all instances of the search phrase with the replace phrase.
Select and scroll to the previous instance of the search phrase within the text document.
Select and scroll to the next instance of the search phrase within the text document.
Use your device\'s back button to exit search mode.
